trans-unit.source: Provides a catalog that keeps references to all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls (and other server controls contained in <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zones) that a user has closed on a single Web Parts page, which enables users to add the closed controls back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別目錄會將所有參考保留<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項 (和其他伺服器控制項中所包含<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>區域) 的使用者已在單一網頁組件頁面，可讓使用者將關閉的控制項加回該頁面上關閉。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The PageCatalogPart class serves one very specific purpose on a Web Parts page: it acts as a page catalog to maintain any controls previously added to the page that a user has closed, so that the user can add them back to the page.
trans-unit.target: PageCatalogPart 類別 Web 組件頁面上提供一個非常特定的用途︰ 它做為頁面類別目錄，以維護任何先前加入至頁面，使用者已關閉，以便使用者可以將它們新增至網頁的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This control is visible only when a Web page is in catalog display mode, a special view that enables users to add and remove controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: 時，才在網頁中目錄的顯示模式，可讓使用者加入和移除控制項在頁面上的特殊檢視，此控制項是可見。

trans-unit.source: Add a PageCatalogPart control to your page if you want to provide users with the flexibility of closing and reopening controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要為使用者提供關閉並重新開啟控制項的彈性，請將 PageCatalogPart 控制項加入您的頁面。

trans-unit.source: If your page does not allow users to close controls at all, there is no need to add a PageCatalogPart control to your page.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的頁面不允許使用者完全關閉的控制項，無須 PageCatalogPart 控制項加入您的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Only closed controls are added to the page catalog.
trans-unit.target: 只有已關閉的控制項加入至頁面類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: A closed control has several attributes: - It is not visible on the page.
trans-unit.target: 已關閉的控制項具有數個屬性:-在頁面上看不到。

trans-unit.source: - It is not rendered on the page.
trans-unit.target: -它不會轉譯頁面上。

trans-unit.source: - It does not participate in page life-cycle phases.
trans-unit.target: -它不會參與頁面生命週期階段。

trans-unit.source: Closing a control is different from deleting it, which permanently removes it from the page.
trans-unit.target: 不同於刪除知識庫，這會永久移除頁面時關閉的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A user can reopen a closed control instance from a page catalog, but after a user deletes a control, he or she can never recover that specific instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以重新開啟已關閉的控制項執行個體從頁面目錄，但使用者刪除控制項之後，他或她可以永遠不會復原該特定執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The most common and convenient way to add a PageCatalogPart control to a page is by declaring it in page persistence format.
trans-unit.target: 將 PageCatalogPart 控制項加入頁面的最常見且便利的方式是藉由宣告頁面保存格式。

trans-unit.source: As with any declarative <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control, a PageCatalogPart control must be declared within the proper context of ASP.NET markup elements on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 如同使用任何宣告式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制項，PageCatalogPart 控制項必須宣告適當內容中的 ASP.NET 標記項目在網頁上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: For a working code example of how to declare a PageCatalogPart control in a Web page, see the Example section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 如何宣告 PageCatalogPart 控制項在網頁中的工作程式碼範例，請參閱本主題的範例 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: You must add the following sequence of declarative elements to the page: 1.
trans-unit.target: 您必須加入網頁中的下列序列宣告式項目︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: An `<asp:catalogzone>` element must be declared, and a child `<zonetemplate>` element must be added to it to contain any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls declared in the zone.
trans-unit.target: `<asp:catalogzone>`必須宣告項目，和子系`<zonetemplate>`項目必須新增至它無法包含任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>宣告區域中的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: An `<asp:pagecatalogpart>` element must be added as a child of the `<zonetemplate>` element.
trans-unit.target: `<asp:pagecatalogpart>`項目必須新增為子系`<zonetemplate>`項目。

trans-unit.source: There might also be other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls declared as child elements of the `<zonetemplate>` element, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 可能也有其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>為的子元素宣告控制項`<zonetemplate>`項目，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The PageCatalogPart class has only one usable property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart.Title%2A> property, which overrides the base property so that a default title can be provided for the page catalog if no value is supplied.
trans-unit.target: PageCatalogPart 類別有只有一個可用的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart.Title%2A>屬性，覆寫基底屬性，讓預設標題可以提供網頁類別目錄，如果未提供值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The remaining properties for the PageCatalogPart class override the inherited properties, but are not actually used for rendering the control.
trans-unit.target: PageCatalogPart 類別的其餘內容覆寫繼承的屬性，但不是會實際用來呈現控制項。

trans-unit.source: They are overridden only so that special code attributes can be set on them to hide them from design tools like [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 覆寫，則只有以便可以對它們設定特殊的程式碼屬性，從設計工具，例如隱藏[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: You should not use these hidden properties, because they have no effect on rendering.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該使用這些隱藏的屬性，因為它們不會影響轉譯。

trans-unit.source: The fact that they are hidden from IntelliSense and the Properties pane in Visual Studio helps developers avoid using them by mistake.
trans-unit.target: 由於它們隱藏的 IntelliSense 和 Visual Studio 中的 [屬性] 窗格可協助開發人員避免不小心使用它們。

trans-unit.source: All these hidden properties are noted as such in their respective Help topics.
trans-unit.target: 所有隱藏的屬性會註明其各自的說明主題中。

trans-unit.source: The PageCatalogPart class also has several important methods.
trans-unit.target: PageCatalogPart 類別也有數個重要的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> method retrieves a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object for each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in the page catalog, which enables a PageCatalogPart control to display information about each server control without having to create an instance of that control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A>方法擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件給每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>頁面目錄中，可讓 PageCatalogPart 控制項來顯示每個伺服器控制項的相關資訊，而不需要建立該控制項的執行個體中的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another method is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart.GetWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 另一個方法是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart.GetWebPart%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart.GetWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method gets an instance of a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, based on the description passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會取得特定的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>傳遞給方法的描述為基礎的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針可能不符合網頁可及性呈現，根據預設，此控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The PageCatalogPart constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: PageCatalogPart 建構函式是預設值。沒有建構函式宣告中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>類別，因此沒有特殊的工作會執行建立類別的新執行個體時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework uses the constructor internally to create an instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 內部使用建構函式建立類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It is possible, but unlikely, that you will need to use the PageCatalogPart constructor programmatically in your own code.
trans-unit.target: 它是可行的但不太可能，您必須在自己的程式碼中以程式設計方式使用 PageCatalogPart 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The intended use of the control is for page developers to add it to a page declaratively at design time.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的用途是網頁程式開發人員將它加入至網頁以宣告方式在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: This inherited property is not used by the Web Parts control set when rendering a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 此繼承的屬性不是由設定轉譯時的 Web 組件控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The property is overridden only for the purpose of preventing it from appearing in [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] designer tools.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會覆寫只是為了防止出現在[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The AccessKey property, as a member of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control.
trans-unit.target: AccessKey 屬性的成員身分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控制，表示未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不應該使用這個屬性。設定具有不會影響轉譯。

trans-unit.source: To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止開發人員使用這個屬性，會在其上隱藏在 Visual Studio 中設定程式碼屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you work with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control in Visual Studio, the AccessKey property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>在 Visual Studio 中，AccessKey 屬性的控制項不是顯示在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用這個屬性，您需要建立自訂的類別繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The custom class can either use the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property as it is, or override it and change its behavior.
trans-unit.target: 自訂的類別可以使用繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>屬性，或覆寫它，並變更其行為。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a keyboard key used for quick keyboard navigation to a control.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於快速的鍵盤導覽至控制項的鍵盤按鍵的字串。

trans-unit.target: 背景色彩 屬性的成員身分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控制，表示未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: When you work with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control in Visual Studio, the BackColor property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>在 Visual Studio 中，BackColor 屬性控制項未出現在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The custom class can either use the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> property as it is, or override it and change its behavior.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of descriptions of the available <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可用的說明集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>的目錄中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions method provides an implementation for the abstract base method declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> class.
trans-unit.target: GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions 方法提供宣告<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>的抽象基底方法的實作

trans-unit.source: The GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions method returns description information for each control in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions 方法會傳回每個控制項的描述資訊的目錄中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object contains essential information about a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，包括其識別碼、 將控制項和幾個重要的屬性，繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>類別，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A>和</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>值的物件參考</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>相關的重要資訊</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>

trans-unit.source: The GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions method improves performance.
trans-unit.target: GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions 方法可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID.
trans-unit.target: 當建立目錄時，需要一些資訊其中的內容，包括標題、 描述、 圖示 （如果有的話） 和 id。 每個控制項

trans-unit.source: Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone that creates a catalog calls the GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions method for each control that will be in the catalog, and the call returns only the description information for the control.
trans-unit.target: 而不必建立要取得這項資訊，每個控制項的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>建立目錄的區域呼叫 GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions 方法為將會在目錄中，每個控制項，則呼叫會傳回只將控制項的描述資訊。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection"></xref> that contains a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref> for each closed <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a page catalog.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection"> </xref>包含<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref>關閉每個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>頁面類別目錄中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control based on the value of the description passed into the method.
trans-unit.target: 將參考傳回給<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項為基礎的值傳遞至方法的描述。

trans-unit.source: The GetWebPart method returns a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control whose description details match the values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object passed into the method.
trans-unit.target: GetWebPart 方法傳回的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制其描述詳細資料相符的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件傳遞至方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this method is used together with the GetWebPart method, which is used to retrieve the descriptions of all the controls in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這個方法搭配 GetWebPart 方法，用來擷取類別目錄中的所有控制項的描述。

trans-unit.source: Individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can then be retrieved or manipulated as needed by passing individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects to the GetWebPart method.
trans-unit.target: 個別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項可以再擷取或操作所需藉由傳遞個別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>GetWebPart 方法的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.target: Visible 屬性中，成員的身分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控制，表示未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不應該使用這個屬性。設定具有不會影響轉譯。

trans-unit.source: To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止開發人員使用這個屬性，會在其上隱藏在 Visual Studio 中設定程式碼屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you work with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control in Visual Studio, the Visible property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>在 Visual Studio 中的 Visible 屬性控制項未出現在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用這個屬性，您需要建立自訂的類別繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The custom class can either use the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property as it is, or override it and change its behavior.
trans-unit.target: 自訂的類別可以使用繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>屬性，或覆寫它，並變更其行為。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>
